contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=December 2009}} [[Image:Vasyugan Swamp.jpg|thumb|250px|Vasyugan swamp in Tomsk region]] The '''Vasyugan Swamp''' ({{Lang-ru|Васюганские болота}}) is the largest [[swamps|swamp]] in the northern hemisphere. It is located in Russia, in [[West Siberian Plain|southwestern Siberia]]. The swamp is a major reservoir of [[fresh water]] for the region, [[Vasyugan River|Vasyugan river]] finds its source there. It is home to a number of [[endangered species]] which is a concern among local [[environmentalist]]s as the production of [[Petroleum|oil]] and [[gas]] has become a major industry in the region. ==Location== {{coord|57|34|N|75|39|E|source:kolossus-ruwiki|display=title}} {{Location map | Russia | width = 250 | float = right | caption = Vasyugan swamp (Russia) | alt = Vasyugan swamp | lat_deg = 57.34 | lon_deg = 75.39 }} It occupies 53,000 km²,<ref>http://www.poormojo.org/pmjadaily/archives/031554.php</ref> which is about 2% of the whole area of [[peat bog]]s of the world. The swamp is located in the [[Novosibirsk Oblast|Novosibirsk]], [[Omsk Oblast|Omsk]], and [[Tomsk Oblast|Tomsk]] regions of [[Russia]] along the west bank of the [[Ob River]], and stretches between latitudes 55°35' and 58°40' North, and longitudes 74°30' and 83°30' East. ==History== It appeared nearly 10 thousand years ago and from that time the bogs have constantly increased. 75% of the contemporary area became waterlogged less than 500 years ago.<ref>http://www.greenpeace.org/russia/en/campaigns/world-natural-heritage/great-vasyugan-mire/</ref> ==Climate== The swamp has a [[continental climate]] ([[Biome#Walter_system|Walter system]]) or [[taiga]] ([[World Wide Fund for Nature|WWF system]]),<ref>Surface of the taiga region on the world: http://www.radford.edu/~swoodwar/CLASSES/GEOG235/biomes/taiga/taiga.html</ref> with long cold winters and short hot summers. ==References== {{Reflist}} == Further reading == http://whc.unesco.org/en/tentativelists/5114/ [[Category:Swamps of Russia]] [[Category:Geography of Novosibirsk Oblast]] [[Category:Geography of Omsk Oblast]] [[Category:Geography of Tomsk Oblast]] {{NovosibirskOblast-geo-stub}} {{OmskOblast-geo-stub}} {{TomskOblast-geo-stub}}
